item.title: One Function Call to Manipulate and Plot Them All
item.description: 1 Motivation to Automation 2 Tidy Eval with rlang 2.1 Works with dplyr 2.2 Fails with data.table 3 Quasiquotation in {base}-R 4 Session Info References xfun::pkg_attach( "knitr", "data.table", "ggplot2", "rlang", "dplyr", "magrittr", "ggthemes" ) opts_chunk$set( message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = TRUE ) # Create a data.table version of the mtcars data set. I explicitly specified to exclude rownames just to be clear (The default in data.
